title: YEAR OF DREAMS 2! PlayStation Press Conference Reactions! - PS I Love You XOXO E3 2016
description:
Subscribe for all your E3 2016 updates! https://www.youtube.com/c/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

All the biggest PlayStation news of E3 2016! Resident Evil VII, Days Gone, Kojima, Spider-Man, God of War, AND CRASH BANDICOOT!

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
